TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WebBaseEvent extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義 ASP.NET 健康監視事件的基底類別。

span.span: Defines the base class for the ASP.NET health-monitoring events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 類別是所有 ASP.NET 健康監視事件類型的繼承樹狀結構的根。The class is the root of the inheritance tree for all the ASP.NET health-monitoring event types. 它會使用類別來取得應用程式資訊提供給其衍生的類別。It uses the class to obtain application information that is available to its derived class. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統``組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中所提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何從衍生類別來建立自訂健全狀況監視的事件。The following example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom health-monitoring event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#1)] 下列範例是組態檔可讓 ASP.NET 使用自訂事件的摘錄。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the custom event. ``` ```

para.span: 這會避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

para.span: 事件代碼，您指定您的自訂事件必須是大於。

span.span: The event code you specify for your custom event must be greater than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來建立的執行個體類別，但您可以呼叫這個建構函式時實作您自己這個類別會繼承的事件類型。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when you implement your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可為事件的資訊，這非常有用，如果事件資料必須記錄，並向使用者顯示更新版本提供統一的格式。The method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user. 它時，內部呼叫提供者會叫用的其中一個方法。It is called internally when the provider invokes one of the methods. > [!NOTE] > 當您設定格式顯示您自訂事件的資訊時，請覆寫方法而非方法。When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 這會避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂方法。The following code example shows how to customize the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常會處理事件的提供者會叫用方法。The method is generally invoked by the provider that processes the event. 此方法可確保標準物件隨附的特定事件的資料。The method ensures that the standard object is provided with the event-specific data. 設定事件資訊格式藉由呼叫事件的特定方法。It formats event information by calling the event-specific method. > [!NOTE] > 當您設定格式顯示您自訂事件的資訊時，請覆寫方法而非方法。When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 這會避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法The following code example shows how to use the method [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/CS/webbaseevent.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent/VB/webbaseevent.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常會處理事件的提供者會叫用方法。The method is generally invoked by the provider that processes the event. 設定事件資訊格式藉由呼叫事件的特定方法。It formats event information by calling the event-specific method. 如果`includeAppInfo`是`true`，標準物件隨附的特定事件的資料。If `includeAppInfo` is `true`, the standard object is provided with the event-specific data. > [!NOTE] > 當您設定格式顯示您自訂事件的資訊時，請覆寫方法而非方法。When you format your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. 這會避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.
